      I mounted mine in a PVC pipe and it makes a good resonator to=
 boot.

I was inspired by what I saw on Ghost Adventures  They had a Pipe a=
 couple feet long and the bottom half of the radio was stuck in a slot on i=
ts side, near the center.  The sound comes out the open ends.  That inspire=
d me to install my own multi component layout in a similar pipe I had and u=
se it also for a resonator. (the white pipe looks better painted black)  I =
cut the slots with a drill and dremmel tool.

My results speak for themselv=
es (see my photo)
